forecastday.title: Friday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Areas of fog early, becoming mostly sunny this afternoon. High 13C. Winds NNE at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Areas of fog early, becoming mostly sunny this afternoon. High 56F. Winds NNE at 10 to 15 mph.

forecastday.title: Friday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Generally clear skies. Low 7C. Winds ENE at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Mostly clear. Low around 45F. Winds ENE at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Saturday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Sunshine and clouds mixed. High 16C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy skies. High 61F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Saturday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy. Low 9C. Winds ESE at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Clear to partly cloudy. Low 48F. Winds ESE at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Sunday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy skies in the morning will give way to cloudy skies during the afternoon. High 19C. Winds SSE at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Intervals of clouds and sunshine in the morning with more clouds for later in the day. High 67F. Winds SSE at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Sunday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy. Low around 10C. Winds SE at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy. Low 51F. Winds SE at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Monday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with occasional rain in the afternoon. High 16C. Winds SSE at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 70%.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with rain developing later in the day. High near 60F. Winds SSE at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 70%.

forecastday.title: Monday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain. Low around 10C. Winds SSE at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 60%. Rainfall around 12mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain likely. Low around 50F. Winds SSE at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 60%. Rainfall near a half an inch.

forecastday.title: Tuesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: A steady rain in the morning. Showers continuing in the afternoon. High 13C. Winds W at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 70%.
forecastday.fcttext: A steady rain in the morning. Showers continuing in the afternoon. High 56F. Winds W at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 70%.

forecastday.title: Tuesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: A few clouds. Low 7C. Winds ESE at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy skies. Low around 45F. Winds ESE at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Wednesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Some sun in the morning with increasing clouds during the afternoon. High 14C. Winds SSE at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly to mostly cloudy. High 57F. Winds SSE at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Wednesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain showers in the evening will evolve into a more steady rain overnight. Low 8C. Winds SSE at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 60%. Rainfall around 6mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain showers in the evening will evolve into a more steady rain overnight. Low 47F. Winds SSE at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 60%. Rainfall around a quarter of an inch.

forecastday.title: Thursday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain likely. High 12C. Winds WSW at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of rain 70%. Rainfall around 12mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain likely. High 53F. Winds WSW at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 70%. Rainfall around a half an inch.

forecastday.title: Thursday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: A steady rain in the evening. Showers continuing late. Low 6C. Winds WNW at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 70%. Rainfall near 6mm.
forecastday.fcttext: A steady rain in the evening. Showers continuing late. Low 43F. Winds WNW at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 70%. Rainfall near a quarter of an inch.

forecastday.title: Friday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Showers in the morning, then clearing with ample sunshine in the afternoon. High 11C. Winds NW at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of rain 30%.
forecastday.fcttext: Showers in the morning, then clearing with ample sunshine in the afternoon. High 52F. Winds NW at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 30%.

forecastday.title: Friday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy skies early followed by mostly cloudy skies and a few showers later at night. Low around 5C. Winds ENE at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 30%.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy skies early giving way to a few showers after midnight. Low 41F. Winds ENE at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 30%.

forecastday.title: Saturday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Considerable cloudiness with occasional rain showers. High 11C. Winds SSE at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 50%.
forecastday.fcttext: Considerable cloudiness with occasional rain showers. High 52F. Winds SSE at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 50%.

forecastday.fcttext: Considerable cloudiness with occasional rain showers. Low 44F. Winds SSE at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 50%.

forecastday.title: Sunday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Showers early, becoming a steady rain later in the day. High 12C. Winds SSE at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 60%. Rainfall near 6mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain showers in the morning will evolve into a more steady rain in the afternoon. High 54F. Winds SSE at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 60%. Rainfall around a quarter of an inch.
